title: Does LoL support macOS Sierra?
body:
I haven't played LoL for a while, I would like to know if LoL runs smoothly on the new system macOS Sierra.
I read that people have had several problems with Sierra, has Riot released patches for the new system?

replies.body: We do support MacOS Sierra! If you're having any issues, in particular, feel free to reach out to us here or in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can do our best to troubleshoot ^_^!
Your game will probably crash every single team fight though.
